WorkItem.Description:
Only uses the hit rating in DPS calculations.
 
Elitist Jerks currently has the 277 version of this Trinket as BiS (http://elitistjerks.com/f79/t88300-enhancement_bis_gear_set_up_discussion_3_3_onward/)
 
The item description shows the effect (but not shown while hovering), but it is definitely not used in calculations (you can remove the effect, and it has no effect on DPS numbers).
WorkItem.Summary: [Enhance] Tiny Abomination in a Jar not modelled

Comments.Message: Scratch this.... just found source commits after the release of 2.3.18 where it's been initially modelled.
